document_data.name: House Maerret
document_data.mainbody: '''House Maerret''' was a [[drow]] house of [[Ched Nasad]].
document_data.History: In [[1370 DR]], this drow house was the ninth house of Ched Nasad, and so the [[matron mother]] had a seat on the ruling council.
document_data.Known Members of House Maerret: * [[Lirdnolu Maerret]], the matron mother and a [[priestess]] of [[Lolth]]
